messages.content: You are an AI assistant that helps people find information. You will receive a task and think step by step. Then provide your final outcome following the regular expression 'Answer: there are [0-9]+ clusters'

Imagine a castle with 15 rooms. Room 1, room 7, room 10, room 13, and room 11 are all connected to each other. Room 2, room 5, room 8, room 11, and room 14 are connected to each other. Room 3, room 6, room 9, room 12, and room 8 are all connected to each other. Room 4, room 7, room 10, room 13, and room 15 are connected to each other. Room 5, room 8, room 11, and room 14 are connected to each other. Room 6, room 9, room 12, and room 15 are connected to each other. Room 7, room 10, and room 13 are connected to each other. Room 8 is connected to room 14. Room 9, room 12 and room 15 are connected to each other. Room 10 is connected to room 13. Room 11 is connected to room 14. Room 12 is connected to room 15. How many densely-connected room clusters do we have in this castle? A densely-connected cluster is a group of rooms that are connected to themselves with a max of 2 rooms.

Step 1: Identify the connections between rooms.
Step 2: Group the rooms into clusters based on the connections.
Step 3: Check if the clusters are densely-connected (max of 2 rooms).

Connections:
1-7-10-13-11
2-5-8-11-14
3-6-9-12-8
4-7-10-13-15
5-8-11-14
6-9-12-15
7-10-13
8-14
9-12-15
10-13
11-14
12-15

Clusters:
Cluster 1: 1-7-10-13-11
Cluster 2: 2-5-8-11-14
Cluster 3: 3-6-9-12-8
Cluster 4: 4-7-10-13-15
Cluster 5: 6-9-12-15
Cluster 6: 7-10-13
Cluster 7: 8-14
Cluster 8: 9-12-15
Cluster 9: 10-13
Cluster 10: 11-14
Cluster 11: 12-15

Step 3: Check if the clusters are densely-connected (max of 2 rooms).
Densely-connected clusters:
Cluster 6: 7-10-13
Cluster 7: 8-14
Cluster 9: 10-13
Cluster 10: 11-14
Cluster 11: 12-15

Answer: there are 5 clusters
